title: Producer Price Index for commodities 1990 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Producer Price Index (100=1982). In total the number of data points it has is 30.
In general Producer Price Index (100=1982) has fallen over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year '19 and '90.
Maximum Producer Price Index (100=1982), about 205.3 was reported at Year '14
The lowest Producer Price Index (100=1982), of value 116.3 was reported at Year '90
